article.title: BAE Supports Integrated Communications and Information Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services Incorporated, Rockville, Maryland, is being awarded a $10,332,954 modification to a previously awarded cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to exercise two options to support the Integrated Communication and Information Systems Division of Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division in the design, integration, testing, installation, training, and certification of shipboard communication systems; the design and integration of like systems at shore sites associated with the deployment of fleet support to surface combatants; and the design, testing, and integration of mobile and airborne communication systems designed to interface with command, control, communications, computers and intelligence architecture of surface combatants.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
